@CNN liar！ bu yao bi lian

The CDC issued first warning on Jan 8

Trump held rallies on Jan 9, Jan 14, Jan 28, Jan 30, Feb 10, Feb 19, Feb 20, Feb 21 & Feb 28.

The first time he admitted coronavirus might be a problem was Mar 13
